程序包 sait.wordtracker.application

类 ReadWord

java.lang.Object
sait.wordtracker.application.ReadWord
public class ReadWord extends Object
check if the binary file (repository.ser) exists, and if so, restores the words tree. scan the txt file, insert the words in the appropriate nodes of the tree. output the all words to the screen or file.

  • 方法详细资料

    • serialBSTree

      public static void serialBSTree() throws IOException
      serialization the Binary Search Tree and storing into a binary file
      抛出:
      IOException - - exceptions produced by failed I/O operations

    • deserialBSTree

      public static void deserialBSTree​(FileInputStream fis) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      de-serialization the Binary Search Tree from the stored file
      参数:
      fis - - input binary file which stored the Binary Search Tree
      抛出:
      IOException - - exceptions produced by failed I/O operations
      ClassNotFoundException - - when the BSTree doesn't exist

    • readFile

      public static void readFile​(String filepath, char printype, String outpath) throws TreeException, IOException
      read file from command line
      参数:
      filepath - - the input file path
      printype - - print the output options
      outpath - - the output file path and name
      抛出:
      TreeException - - when the tree is empty
      IOException - - produced by failed orinterrupted I/O operations

    • constructBST

      public static void constructBST​(String[] words, String file, int lineNumber) throws TreeException
      read the input file and create the Word object, put the Word object into BSTree
      参数:
      words - - an array hold an line of words
      file - - the word that comes from (location)
      lineNumber - - the word locates in the file
      抛出:
      TreeException - - when the tree is empty

    • printOut

      public static void printOut​(char printype, String outpath) throws IOException
      print the BSTree to the screen and file
      参数:
      printype - - print the output options
      outpath - - the output file path and name
      抛出:
      IOException - - produced by failed orinterrupted I/O operations

      public static void test()
      output functionality test just for test it's not meaningful in the program
